constructor-arg.value: SELECT lot.id, lot.title, lot.startDate, lot.endDate, lot.currency, lot.startPrice, lot.quickBuyPrice, lot.type, lot.maxBidId, bid.bid as maxBidValue FROM lot left JOIN bid ON bid.lotId=lot.id;

SELECT lot.id, lot.title, lot.startDate, lot.endDate, lot.currency, lot.startPrice, lot.quickBuyPrice, lot.type, lot.maxBidId, bid.bid as maxBidValue FROM lot JOIN category ON lot.categoryId=category.id left JOIN bid ON bid.lotId=lot.id WHERE category.id = :categoryId;
